extendedInfo.description: Amazing live wallpaper which will allow you to enjoy the pictures of the Congo Flag all of the time.To change the Live Wallpaper image you should do double click on the image. Also you can do it from the options menu too, where you can also configure the speed, transparency...To INSTALL: You should open the application and press the menu button and select the option to "Set Live Wallpaper".
